column1: Local Foods////I remember when I first tried this place
column2: I had the duck confit sandwich
column4: most delicious sandwich I'd ever had. They've since taken it off the menu (I think? they just brought it back this week for a hot minute)
column5: so I've had to try everything else
column6: which is just as good. The crunchy chicken sandwich is good
column7: but a tad cumbersome to eat. Same with the truffle egg sandwich. it tastes fine
column8: but the pretzel bread it too crunchy to really keep the sandwich together
column9: so I just ended up eating it with a fork. The limeade is dangerously good. The quinoa's okay? I could eat a punch bowl of the kale though. I come back to this place probably once or twice a month.
